attributes.action: Open Scottish Indoor Soft Play Centre’s.
attributes.additional_details: Winter is setting in and with miserable weather on the way people in Scotland need indoor soft play centre’s to open for somewhere to take their children. Children under 12 in Scotland don’t need to social distance and aren’t included in the rule of 6, therefore why can’t they go to an indoor soft play so help them socialise the with other children of similar ages.
attributes.background: Open Scottish indoor soft play for children under 12.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
